1.title: The Pilot
1.plot: It's the beginning of the semester and Milo is already in trouble with his friends Sandy, Floze and Deb. Mocked for his lame pick-up lines, Milo makes a bet his method can get a date before anyone else in the group.

2.title: The Sorority
2.plot: While recruiting Milo to be her sorority's "project boy," Sandy opens up an old argument with Deb over the sorority. Sandy convinces Deb to come to one meeting, where she meets Renee, the reigning she-devil of Kappa Kappa Kappa.

3.title: The Freegan
3.plot: After a chance encounter with a freegan, Floze embraces the lifestyle of a "jobless urban forager." Days into his new way of life, he subjects Milo, Deb and Sandy to it and finds himself ostracized from the group.

4.title: The Level 12 Dwarf
4.plot: Sandy unwittingly hooks up with an avid live action role-player, named David, while he's "in character." Completely turned off by David, she schemes to only be around him when he's "Mowgar, Dwarven Champion of Fae Run."

5.title: The Other Man
5.plot: Deb has a new man in her life, and it's not Milo. But he looks like Milo, talks like Milo, dresses like Milo and even has the same major as Milo. Floze encourages Milo to take the high road with a mature response.

6.title: The Girlfriend
6.plot: Floze has a girlfriend? And she's from Sandy's sorority? The group has no idea how to handle Floze's new squeeze: bumbling freshman Laura. But does Laura have any idea how to handle Floze?

7.title: The Little Brother
7.plot: Sandy's little brother Blaire is in town to get the college experience. But after being abandoned with his sister's friends, Deb, Milo and Floze are about to get the Blaire experience.

8.title: The Gamestation
8.plot: Cut off by his parents, a desperate Milo is talked into flipping a new video game system on launch day by Floze. But their plans are complicated by the LARPers, who are already in line with Renee?

9.title: The Sandwich Artist
9.plot: Crushed that his favorite sandwich shop has switched the way it slices cheese, Floze organizes a protest to let his views be known. But a rival group with their own grievances against the shop shows up and tries to hijack his movement.

10.title: The Roommate
10.plot: Milo attempts to regroup the gang just in time for their bocce league's playoffs, but finds Deb annoyed with him, Floze unresponsive and Sandy distracted by her new roommate: "Nazi" Nancy.

11.title: The Toaster
11.plot: Refusing to fall victim to the soggy slice, Floze schemes to bring a toaster into the dorms past an R.A. who plays by his own set of rules. Milo, Deb and Sandy find themselves recruited for the greatest heist in school history.

imdb.plot outline: Inspired by the classics from Cheers to Friends, Confab is a throwback web series to the golden age of sitcoms: bringing this old school genre to the new medium of the web. Following four college juniors in Washington, D.C. through the most incredible semester of their lives, Confab is an accessible situation comedy with relatable characters, over the top situations and hilarious insight on life, love and pop culture. Everyman Milo, armchair philosopher Floze, coffee shop hipster Deb and reluctant sorority sister Sandy meet every day in the same place on campus. Their lives intersect in this small section of the Union where they confabulate over the novelties of the day. Throughout the series they find themselves wrapped up with the campus freegan, a rogue RA with nothing to lose, the college LARP club, a World War 2 enthusiast sorority sister, their doggelgangers, the tyranny of a fast food chain and much more. A fun and energetic show, Confab delivers on big laughs with characters that mirrors each wacky person you have encountered in your life. bringing fresh and different elements to a format we all love. Follow the adventures, misadventures, excitement, schemes, philosophies, quirks, rivalries, and loyalties of an eclectic group of college friends as they try to make it through another school year amidst odd classes, situations, and even odder people.
